metadata.title: CVE-2024-41671 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Twisted is an event-based framework for internet applications, supportingPython 3.6+. The HTTP 1.0 and 1.1 server provided by twisted.web couldprocess pipelined HTTP requests out-of-order, possibly resulting ininformation disclosure. This vulnerability is fixed in 24.7.0rc1.

criterions.comment: twisted package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
